Navigate to other release versions of Doxee Platform Composer

[6.6](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/composer-6-6)

[6.7](https://docs.doxee.com/docs/en/composer-6-7)

You can activate and deactivate the spell check function in the header (title bar) by clicking the ABC-icon.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Spellcheck menu button*

After activation, the ABC icon is extended with a tick and all spelling errors in the text are underlined with a red wavy line.

With a right click on the highlighted word suggestions and the options *Add to dictionary *and *Ignore *are displayed. If there is no suggestion from the dictionary, only the options *Add to dictionary *and *Ignore *are displayed. By selecting a suggestion, the selected word is replaced and the wavy line disappears.

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Spellcheck context menu*

If a word has been added to the ignore list, it can be removed from the list with a right click and the selection *Remove from ignored*.

![](data:image/jpeg;base64,)

*Remove from ignored*

#### Language Selection
Any number of dictionaries in different languages can be added to the Composer configuration. To the right of the ABC icon, the language of the dictionary can be selected by clicking on the arrow:

![](data:image/png;base64,)

*Language selection menu*
